column1: Quote
You are enough, just as you are.
In the darkest hour, the stars shine brightest.
The heart whispers what the mind cannot understand.
Love doesn't need to be perfect, it just needs to be true.
Every tear holds a story of strength.
The bravest thing you can do is keep going.
Hope is a whisper in the storm.
Kindness is a language the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
Sometimes, the hardest battles are the ones we fight within.
You are more resilient than you know.
Life is too short to waste on things that don't make you smile.
Every scar tells a story of survival.
What you seek is seeking you.
It's okay to be a work in progress.
Your mistakes do not define you.
Even broken crayons still color.
Storms make trees take deeper roots.
You can rise up from anything.
The world breaks everyone, but afterward, some are stronger at the broken places.
Your past is just a story, and once you realize this, it has no power over you.
The soul knows when it's time to heal.
You are the sky; everything else is just the weather.
You cannot pour from an empty cup.
Every day may not be good, but there is something good in every day.
Healing takes time, but time doesn't wait.
You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
Courage is not the absence of fear but the triumph over it.
The more you love your decisions, the less you need others to love them.
What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
Even on the hardest days, there is a reason to smile.
It's okay to not be okay.
Where there is love, there is life.
Time doesn't heal all wounds, but it does give you space to learn from them.
Sometimes you have to let go to grow.
You are stronger than you think.
Inhale courage, exhale fear.
The best view comes after the hardest climb.
No rain, no flowers.
Love yourself first, and everything else will fall into place.
The wound is where the light enters you.
There is always light after the dark.
Every sunrise is an invitation to brighten someone's day.
You are the hero of your own story.
Small steps in the right direction are still progress.
It always seems impossible until it's done.
You don't need to have it all figured out to move forward.
Happiness is found when you stop comparing yourself to others.
Your value doesn't decrease based on someone's inability to see your worth.
You were born to be real, not perfect.
Letting go doesn't mean giving up; it means moving on.
Everything you need is already inside you.
It's not about how many times you fall, but how many times you get back up.
Take the risk or lose the chance.
Turn your wounds into wisdom.
Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations.
Sometimes the smallest step in the right direction ends up being the biggest step of your life.
Growth is painful. Change is painful. But nothing is as painful as staying stuck somewhere you don't belong.
The only way out is through.
You can't start the next chapter of your life if you keep re-reading the last one.
It's not who you are that holds you back, it's who you think you're not.
You have been assigned this mountain to show others it can be moved.
When nothing goes right, go left.
Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.
The strongest people are not those who show strength in front of us but those who win battles we know nothing about.
You can't pour from an empty cup; take care of yourself first.
The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
It's never too late to be what you might have been.
Out of difficulties grow miracles.
Happiness can be found even in the darkest of times if one only remembers to turn on the light.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
Dream as if you'll live forever, live as if you'll die today.
You must do the thing you think you cannot do.
Sometimes the bad things that happen in our lives put us on the path to the best things that will ever happen to us.
One day or day one. You decide.
Strength grows in the moments when you think you can't go on but you keep going anyway.
Be the change you wish to see in the world.
Life isn't about waiting for the storm to pass; it's about learning to dance in the rain.
Believe you can and you're halfway there.
If you're going through hell, keep going.
Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
Life is tough, but so are you.
Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
Don't count the days, make the days count.
Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
You are never too small to make a difference.
Everything happens for a reason, even if you don't understand it at the time.
Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
Stars can't shine without darkness.
The best way to predict your future is to create it.
You are never alone. The universe is conspiring to help you.
Sometimes, you just have to jump and build your wings on the way down.
Your story isn't over yet.
Take a deep breath; it's just a bad day, not a bad life.
Life isn't measured by the breaths we take, but by the moments that take our breath away.
Do not fear failure, but rather fear not trying.
Start where you are, use what you have, do what you can.
If you get tired, learn to rest, not to quit.
Keep going because you didn't come this far just to come this far.
You have the power to say, 'This is not how my story will end.'
